Exercise

For both of the following curves expressed in parametric form obtain expressions for \(\dfrac{dy}{dx}\) and \(\dfrac{d^2y}{dx^2}\) and then use this information to help make a sketch of the curve on paper.

(a) \(\quad x=t^2-{@aa@}t,\ \ y=t^2-{@bb@}t\)

(b) \(\quad x=t^3-{@cc@}t-{@dd@},\ \ y=t^2-t-{@ee@}\)

generalfeedback.text:
We are asked to obtain expressions for \(\dfrac{dy}{dx}\) and \(\dfrac{d^2y}{dx^2}\) and use this information to help make a sketch for both

(a) \( x=t^2-{@aa@}t,\ \ y=t^2-{@bb@}t,\quad \) and (b) \( x=t^3-{@cc@}t-{@dd@},\ \ y=t^2-t-{@ee@}.\)


(a) We know that \(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\div\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t},\) so we find these derivatives from our parametric equations in (a):

\(\qquad \displaystyle x=t^2-{@aa@}t \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - {@aa@},\) and

\(\qquad \displaystyle y=t^2-{@bb@}t \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - {@bb@}.\)

So

\(\qquad \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\div\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = \displaystyle {@ta1@}.\)

Now we wish to find \(\dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}\), and we remember that

\(\qquad \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}=\left(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}t^2}-\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\dfrac{d^2 x}{\mathrm{d}t^2}\right)\div\left(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}\right)^3\)

So we find each of these derivatives:

\(\qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - {@bb@} \implies \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}t^2} = 2,\) and

\(\qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - {@aa@} \implies \dfrac{d^2 x}{\mathrm{d}t^2} = 2.\)

So our second derivative becomes

\(\qquad \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}= \dfrac{(2t - {@aa@}) \times 2 - (2t - {@bb@}) \times 2}{(2t-{@aa@})^3} = \displaystyle {@ta2@}.\)

A graph of the curve is shown below.

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { // STACK: when moving to STACK change 'jxgboard' for divid boundingbox: [{#-bb-2#}, {#2*bb + 1#}, {#2*bb + 1#}, {#-bb-2#}], keepaspectratio: true, showCopyright: false, axis: true, showNavigation: false }); // Parametric functions const f1 = t => t * t - {#aa#}*t; const g1 = t => t * t - {#bb#}*t; // Create the parametric curve for t in [-10,10] board.create('curve', [f1, g1, -10, 10], { strokeColor: 'blue', strokeWidth: 2 }); var pt1 = board.create('point', [0, 0], { name: 't = 0', label: { offset: [-10, 10] }, size: 2, color: 'black', fixed: true }); [[/jsxgraph]]

(b) Again, since \(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\div\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t},\) we find these derivatives from our parametric equations in (b):

\(\qquad \displaystyle x=t^3-{@cc@}t-{@dd@} \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = 3t^2 - {@cc@},\) and

\(\qquad \displaystyle y=t^2-t-{@ee@} \implies \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t - 1.\)

So

\(\qquad \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}x}=\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\div\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} = \displaystyle {@ta3@}.\)

Now we wish to find \(\dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}\), and again we remember that

\(\qquad \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}=\left(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}t^2}-\dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t}\dfrac{d^2 x}{\mathrm{d}t^2}\right)\div\left(\dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t}\right)^3\)

So again we find each of these derivatives:

\(\qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}y}{\mathrm{d}t} = 2t -1 \implies \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}t^2} = 2,\) and

\(\qquad \displaystyle \dfrac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} =3t^2 - {@cc@} \implies \dfrac{d^2 x}{\mathrm{d}t^2} = 6t.\)

So our second derivative becomes

\(\qquad \dfrac{d^2y}{\mathrm{d}x^2}= \dfrac{(3t^2 - {@cc@}) \times 2 - (2t - 1) \times 6t}{(3t^2-{@cc@})^3} = \displaystyle {@ta4@}.\)

A graph of the curve is shown below.

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { // STACK: when moving to STACK change 'jxgboard' for divid boundingbox: [{#-cc-2#}, {#cc^2#}, {#cc^2#}, {#-cc-2#}], keepaspectratio: true, showCopyright: false, axis: true, showNavigation: false }); // Parametric functions const f2 = t => t * t * t - {#cc#}*t - {#dd#}; const g2 = t => t * t - t - {#ee#}; // Create the parametric curve for t in [-10,10] board.create('curve', [f2, g2, -10, 10], { strokeColor: 'blue', strokeWidth: 2 }); var t_label_1 = {#t_value_1#}.toFixed(2) var t_label_2 = {#t_value_2#}.toFixed(2) // Double point var pt2 = board.create('point', [{#x_coord#}, {#y_coord#}], { name: 't = ' + t_label_1 +',' + t_label_2, label: { offset: [-85, 9] }, size: 2, color: 'black', fixed: true }); [[/jsxgraph]]
